title: Poser Essentials
description:
This torrent holds a few files that I&#039;ve found essential in creating great pieces.

* Dendras Dungeon Construction Kit - Great for creepy halls and underground hallways.

* Creature Creation Pack (with Bump Maps seperate) - This one has a lot of nifty things to make your normal figures turn into custom fantasy freaks.

* Jepe&#039;s "Throwz, Steamz, and Flamez" props - Honestly I&#039;ve found these to be useful on multiple levels.  They are great for independent background effects and also great for adding a magical flair to your characters. 

* Castle Creator - A nice castle construction kit that has multiple towers, walls, buidlings, gates, ect that you can mix and match for your own castle complex.

* Medieval City - This one is the base set of any medieval scene.  You can use the buildings individually or as groups but when building a town/city they certainly make a great resource.

* Fantasy Creature Bundle - Not all of these creatures are great for all occasions but this bundle has enough versatility that its worth getting for the times when you need a creature.

As always, I urge you to purchase them from the vendor (http://www.daz3d.com for most) if you really find them useful.
